dcterms:description: A dataset containing 245,575 match data of League of Legends collected using the RiotAPI, including matches from North America, Europe, South Korea, and Japan played between May 10 and 17, 2021. The dataset includes metadata and timeline data for each match, detailing significant events and player actions.
dcterms:title: League of Legends Match Data

dcterms:description: A lookup table created from League of Legends game data that maps champions to their respective roles, allowing for the conversion of champion information into one-hot encoded vectors for use in analysis.
dcterms:title: Champion-Role Vector Lookup Table
